Sniper


Sniper in his cell hears Brix talk about some plan to fix the ark
from 
supplies on the moon to rebuild the ark, "why not fly back to 
Cybertron and get supplies from the arks home planet. We would have 
more of the original stuff that made the ark."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster sighs. "Allright, I'll meet you in the landing bay."
> 
> He activates a comm to Primal. "I have to take care of something, 
I'll be 
> right back."
> 
> Kluster stands up, walking out of the bridge and heading off toward 
the 
> landing bay.
